thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cloud Peak Energy Announces Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.23

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cloud Peak Energy Announces Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.23
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Cloud Peak Energy Inc:
* ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 * QTRLY REVENUE $213.9 MILLION VERSUS $227.9 MILLION * SEES 2018 CAPEX $15 MILLION TO $25 MILLION * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $75 MILLION TO $100 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03, REVENUE VIEW $244.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.13 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
